name: Grewbub Hunter
description:
Several varieties of alien bubble creatures have invaded our worlds, consuming the native species. You can join the ranks of the Grewbub Hunters to help stem the infestations.  

- Short, casual game play
- 3 difficulty settings (The easiest setting makes a great game for beginners!)
- 11 levels (plus tutorial)
- Single player
- Uses keyboard and mouse. You can play left-handed, right-handed, or two-handed (instructions included in tutorial)
- No ads

Note:  Unity WebGL games are not officially supported on Mobile.  See the link to the US Amazon store for a free version that plays on your Android tablet.
